notes.text: sap.m.DatePicker: Now DatePicker does not override the style of the Dialog
sap.m.Dialog: Scrollbar detection improved for IE
sap.m.MessageStrip: Formatted text has an inline positioning
sap.m.MultiInput: Cloning is now corrected
sap.m.MultiInput: Delete list mode is always used
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Inverted status is shown correctly in ObjectPage
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Calculating height in percents corrected
sap.m.SelectDialog: Click delegate changed to tap
sap.m.Link: Support of changing the target in adaptation mode
sap.m.TabContainer: Added new background design property
sap.m.TableSelectDialog: Draggable and resizable properties added. Tests added.
SAP-icons: Add "soccer" as alias for "soccor" (typo)
UploadCollection: Terminating an upload removes an item from the collection
sap.m.Button: Closing button pressed loop on popup opened
sap.m.Button: text and icon are visible when the control is inside active list
sap.m.Carousel: Changing pages with keys fast is now possible
sap.m.ComboBox: Closing after interaction race condition fixed
sap.m.DateRangeSelection: documentation is updated
sap.m.DateTimeField: binding used in UTC mode specified in source works correctly
sap.m.FacetFilter: doesn't show button if the list is empty
sap.m.IconTabBar: Padding classes are now forwarded to the header
sap.m.Input: Placeholder is now fully visible in rtl
sap.m.Input: Value is now preserved when value help is requested
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Value State Error is reset correctly
sap.m.MultiInput: Demokit sample adjusted
sap.m.ObjectHeader: Active title with level different than 1 is displayed correctly
sap.m.ObjectStatus: pseudo invisible text for ARIA doesn't take space
sap.m.Popover: Popover does not close on navigation
sap.m.Popover: aria-labelledby improvement
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: minor fix in a sample
sap.m.Token: Toggle selection on space key adjusted
sap.m.Tree: No action is needed for dummy leaf expander
sap.m.demokit.tutorial.walkthrough: add missing file to config
SAP Icons v4.5 update
StandardListItem: visual adaptation
sap.m.SinglePlanningCalendar: fires viewChange event
P13nConditionPanel: improve date validation
TreeItemBase: selection handling on model reset enhanced
sap.m.Carousel: visiblePagesCount now stops loop in all directions
sap.m.MenuButton: Disabled button is no longer highlighted on press
sap.m.MultiComboBox: Sync selectedKeys & selectedItems
sap.m.ObjectStatus: Accessibility improved
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: Order in controls' collection is fixed
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Expand functionality select removed for mobile devices
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Sorting sample corrected
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: formats picker text properly in foreign languages
sap.m.Switch: Fiori 3 VD changes
sap.m.TabStripItem: Close button has tooltip now
sap.m.ActionSheet: Scrollbar is now visible on tablet
sap.m.Breadcrumbs: separatorStyle key-value pair names are now matching
sap.m.OverflowToolbar: No exception when content is undefined
sap.m.TileContainer: focus index is correct now
sap.m.Toolbar: Corrected vertical alignment
sap.m.Wizard: Detach event listeners from the step when removed

GenericTile breathing & language fix

sap.m.ObjectStatus: ARIA texts placed in messagebundle
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Sticky header adjusted properly onThemeChanged
sap.m.DatePicker: setDisplayFormat does not trigger focus in
sap.m.FacetFilter: Default filters no longer removed
sap.m.FacetFilter: gets correctly the active state of the FacetList
sap.m.RadioButton: valueState is now updated if there is a Message
sap.m.StepInput: Validation is working and exception is thrown if necessary
sap.m.UploadCollection : Deletion of email when drag and dropped from MS outlook to chrome.
sap.m.Wizard: destroySteps causing browsers to crash fixed
sap.m.MultiInput: Improved performance on addToken
sap.m.NumericContent: Property truncateValueTo is not ignored anymore & Case insensitive NumericContent lang map + add en_US lang.
sap.m.ObjectHeader: qunit tests are passing now
sap.m.TileContainer: pre-renders tiles in both directions
sap.m.ComboBox, sap.m.MultiComboBox, sap.m.Input: Disable autocomplete on android
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: load not density aware image by default
GenericTile title extends beyond 2 lines in ContentMode in IE, FF and Edge
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Navigation doesn't throw an error
sap.m.QuickView: Popover is now displayed properly on iOS and OS X
sap.m.SearchField: search event is now fired correctly in IE
sap.m.SegmentedButton: accessibility state is now maintained corretly
sap.m.Title: titleStyle property now affects aria-level
sap.m.DateRangeSelection: doesn't throw error
sap.m.FacetFilter: initial data service query optimization option now added
sap.m.ViewSettingsDialog - proper Back button vertical alignment
sap.m.MultiInput: Duplicate tokens on mobile fixed.
sap.m.SearchField: Suggestions no longer auto open on mobile
sap.m.MessageView: Console error in _restoreItemsType prevented
sap.m.FactFilter: selected items text in the facet buttons is now correct
sap.m.VBox: Default Column direction is now set properly
sap.m.Bar: Preventing lost focus of input elements in middle content
sap.m.Input: ValueHelpRequest is no longer triggered on all interactions
sap.m.Dialog: Texts are no longer blurred in Chrome
sap.m.ComboBox: Disable text selection for selected option on tablets
sap.m.Slider: Adjust tickmarks and tooltips positioning
sap.m.Input: Clone method fixed
sap.m.Tile: doesn't set position if hidden from parent
sap.m.PlanningCalendarHeader - View switch remains the same after overflow
sap.m.StepInput - key navigation now works fine in table after pressing of F2
sap.m.Wizard: OPA tests adjusted
sap.m.FlexBox: Styles are now changed correctly
sap.m.upload.UploadSet : setThumbnailUrl does not change icon
sap.m.ComboBox: Exception in OData v4 fixed
sap.m.Button: Press event fires once
sap.m.ActionSheet: Control is now rendered correctly on mobile
sap.m.TimePicker: changes its value when support2400 property is used
sap.m.Wizard: iOS/Safari scroll fixed
sap.m.SuggestionsPopover: Navigating through the IME popover via arrow keys fixed
sap.m.Breadcrumb: Prevented redundant invalidation
sap.m.NavContainer: Tests are now passing on IE11
sap.m.TimePicker: on focus in behavior over the input is now consistent
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: min/max date are now properly set
sap.m.Select: Fixed out of bounds text in the list items
sap.m.Wizard: Next button handler now fired before attachComplete
sap.m.TimePicker: qunit tests are optimized
sap.m.Dialog: Prevent resizing of content above max-height
sap.m.TimePicker: on focus in behavior over the input is now consistent
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: manages selectedAppointments association correctly
sap.m.MultiInput: selectedKey reset on user input
sap.m.StepInput: the increment and decrement buttons state is correctly managed
sap.m.FacetFilterList: data request on listOpen event can be prevented
sap.m.RadioButton: Label in RTL aligned
sap.m.MultiInput: Prevent exception when pressing arrows
sap.m.SematicPage: getCustomFooterContent return copy of array
sap.m.InputBase: IE & Safari no longer fire change event on value selection in IME popover
sap.m.PlanningCalendar: Min and max dates work
sap.m.MessageStrip: Accessibility enhancement
sap.m.upload.UploadSet : UploadSet control issue while renaming file delete button does not remove selected filename.
sap.m.StepInput: increasing/decreasing of the value now stops when touch ended
sap.m.StepInput: No JS error when there is OData binding
